short_summary: This procurement is to hire a Human Resources Consultant to analyze and make recommendations on staffing levels for Food Services Operations at Correctional Service of Canada institutions.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Contract Title
Human Resources Consultant - Food Services (Cancelation Notice)

#### Contract Details
* Contract Title: Human Resources Consultant - Food Services
* Contractor Affiliation: Correctional Service Canada (CSC)
* Contract Reference Number: cb-6203-93306458
* Contract Number: 21120-23-4244880
* Amendment Number: 8 (latest update)
* Solicitation Date: 2023-06-09
* Tender Closing Date: Cancelled

#### Deadlines and Timeline
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: July 31, 2024

#### Scope of Work
This request for proposal is part of Task Based Professional Services (TSPS) requirement for a Senior Human Resources Consultant to analyze and make recommendations on a staffing model review for Food Services Operations at Correctional Service Canada (CSC) institutions.

#### Invitation to Suppliers
The following Succesful Arrangement (SA) holders are invited to submit a proposal:

* Acosys Consulting Services Inc.
* Adirondack Information Management Inc.
* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
* BDO Canada LLP
* Donna Cona Inc.
* Goss Gilroy Inc.
* NATTIQ INC.
* Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
* Paton & Associates Management Consulting Incorporated
* Portage Personnel Inc.
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* T.E.S. Contract Services INC.
* Thomas&Schmidt Inc.

#### Trade Agreements and Regions
The contract is open to suppliers who have successfully bid on Trade agreements such as Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, among others. The scope of work is open to suppliers in Canada.

#### Contact Information
For more information contact:
* Name: Darryl Singh
* Email: darryl.singh@csc-scc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 573-5918

#### Tender Documents
For full details on the contract, including proposal instructions, download the tender document [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6203/4244880_npp_1.pdf).
